recommended_degree: Teknik Elektro, Teknik Mekatronika, Mekatronika, Elektronika, Elektronika Industri (Sarjana)
job_description:
This position will support the Process Quality Engineering (PQE) team.

Your daily tasks will include:
1.Enhance PQE Data Collection. Support data gathering, updating, and reporting for quality analysis.
2. Optimize Limit Sample Management. Assist in managing, organizing, and monitoring limit samples.
3. Develop Online Lab Analysis Timeline Accuracy. Help improve the accuracy and monitoring of lab analysis timelines.
4. Support Abnormality Data Collection & Confirmation. Assist PQE engineers in collecting and confirming abnormal data for analysis and investigation.
